description: Metadata for multiple World Bank Group databases.

IFC.description: Contains information about investment and advisory services projects provided by the International Finance Corporation (IFC). IFC, a member of the World Bank Group, is the largest global development institution focused on the private sector in developing countries. IFC is a dynamic organization, constantly adjusting to the evolving needs of our clients in emerging markets. IFC seeks to provide accurate and timely information regarding our investment and advisory services activities to clients, partners, stakeholders.

investment_services_projects.description: Details about specific IFC investment projects.

Date Disclosed.description: The date when the project information was publicly disclosed.

Project Name.description: The official name of the investment project.

Document Type.description: The type of document associated with the disclosure (e.g., Environmental and Social Review Summary).

Project Number.description: A unique identifier assigned to the project by IFC.

Project Url.description: URL link to the project details page on the IFC website.

Product Line.description: The type of financial product or service offered (e.g., Loan, Equity, Guarantee).

Company Name.description: The name of the company receiving the investment or advisory service.

Country.description: The country where the project is located or the company is based.

Industry.description: The primary industry sector of the project or company.

Environmental Category.description: IFC's environmental risk category assigned to the project (e.g., A, B, C, FI).

Department.description: The IFC department responsible for the project.

Status.description: The current status of the project (e.g., Active, Closed, Pending).

Projected Board Date.description: The date the project was originally expected to be presented to the IFC Board.

IFC Approval Date.description: The date the project was approved by the IFC Board.

IFC Signed Date.description: The date the legal agreements for the project were signed.

IFC Invested Date.description: The date IFC's investment was disbursed.

IFC investment for Risk Management(Milli.description: The amount of IFC investment allocated for risk management products, in millions of USD.

IFC investment for Guarantee(Million USD.description: The amount of IFC investment provided as guarantees, in millions of USD.

IFC investment for Loan(Million USD).description: The amount of IFC investment provided as loans, in millions of USD.

IFC investment for Equity(Million USD).description: The amount of IFC investment provided as equity, in millions of USD.

Total IFC investment as approved by Boar.description: The total amount of IFC investment approved by the Board across all product types, in millions of USD.

As of Date.description: The date the data snapshot was taken or is valid as of.

MIGA.description: Contains information about MIGA (Multilateral Investment Guarantee Agency) projects. MIGA provides political risk insurance (guarantees) for projects in a broad range of sectors in developing member countries, covering all regions of the world. MIGA promotes foreign direct investment by providing political risk insurance and credit enhancement to investors and lenders against losses caused by noncommercial risks.

Project Name.description: The official name of the MIGA-guaranteed project.

Sector.description: The primary industry or economic sector of the project.

Country.description: The country where the project is located or the investment is made.

Gross Exposure, US$.description: The total potential financial liability or exposure MIGA holds for the project, in US dollars.

Fiscal Year.description: The fiscal year relevant to the project guarantee (e.g., year of issuance).

ibrd_ida_summary.description: Contains information about the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) and the International Development Association (IDA). IBRD lends to governments of middle-income and creditworthy low-income countries. IDA provides interest-free loans – called credits – and grants to governments of the poorest countries. Together, IBRD and IDA make up the World Bank.

project_id.description: The unique identifier for the project.

project_name.description: The official name of the project.

product_number.description: The product number for the project.

principal_amount.description: The principal amount of the project.

available_amount.description: The available amount of the project.

disbursed_amount.description: The disbursed amount of the project.

country.description: The country to which lending is provided.

status.description: The status of the project. Contains values like 'Approved', 'Disbursed', 'Signed', Terminated, Fully Cancelled, Effective, etc.

approval_date.description: The date the project was approved.
